description: System-generated unique key for the external account grouping used to classify financial transactions for integrations with outside accounting/ERP systems.
Abbreviated code for the external account group used to map fleet transactions to the appropriate ledger category in external systems.
Full descriptive name of the external account group shown to users and reports to clarify the mappingâ€™s purpose.
Boolean flag indicating the group is no longer active; true means retained for history only and should be excluded from new mappings or selections.
